column2: Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows - USD ($) $ in Millions
Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows - USD ($) $ in Millions.1

column1: ('Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows - USD ($) $ in Millions', 'Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows - USD ($) $ in Millions')
Adjustments to reconcile net income to net cash provided by (used in) operating activities:
Net changes in assets and liabilities, net of non-operating effects:
Accounts payable, accrued expenses and other liabilities
Net cash provided by (used in) operating activities
Other sales, maturities and repayments (primarily short-term and other long-term investments)
Other (primarily short-term and other long-term investments)
Net cash provided by (used in) investing activities
Deposits and interest credited to contractholder deposit funds
Withdrawals and benefit payments from contractholder deposit funds
Net proceeds on issuance of long-term debt
Net cash provided by (used in) financing activities
Effect of foreign currency rate changes on cash and cash equivalents
Net increase / (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents
Income taxes paid, net of refunds

[1] As required in adopting ASU 2016-15, the Company retrospectively reclassified $137 million in 2015 and $111 million in 2014 of cash distributions of earnings from partnership investments from investing to operating activities. The comparable amount reported in operating activities in 2016 was $144 million. See Note 2 for further discussion. [2] As required in adopting Accounting Standard Update ("ASU") 2016-09, the Company retrospectively reclassified $79 million in 2015 and $53 million in 2014 of cash payments from operating to financing activities. These payments were related to employee tax obligations associated with stock compensation. The comparable amount reported in financing activities in 2016 was $72 million. See Note 2 for further discussion.
